DOC.brief_summary: This study is going to compare diffusionweigthed MRI scanning to the result of surgey in patients with metastasis from brestcancer in the axilla
DOC.brief_title: Diffusion Weighted MRI for Lymphnodes in the Axilla
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed breast cancer patients, where ultrasound and cytologi has proved one or more malignant lymphnodes in the axilla. Pacemaker metal in the body claustrphobia psychiatry patients pregnancy age below 18 years
